message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $150 for it. Would you consider accepting this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $175?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $160 for the product. This is my maximum price, as I am looking to keep my spending within $80.
